page.title: 05CHILDRENS GAMES
page.content: {GAMES CHILDREN PLAY} In school children play {Cops and {Robbers, Skipping and British {Bulldogs.}To play Cops and Robbers some people are on, they count and chase the other people. When they catch them they take them back to the den. If someone runs to den and gets through everyone is saved. The boys play{football.}The games are not rough they are played in the playground. We do make up games of our own but we do not mix the sexes as a general rule. {Push Ball}used to be played in Pershore, a six foot diameter ball was made and pushed backwards and forwards by teams of five on each side on a large field. Games tend to be seasonal in school much as other areas of England.
